titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Tower of London, by M. Dering the xi. day of Dece[m]ber. 1569
Sermon preached at the Tower of London, the eleventh day of December. 1569
titleStmt.author: Dering, Edward, 1540?-1576.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwelling ouer Aldersgate,

notesStmt.note: In title, line 4 reads "the xi. day of Dece", and line 5 reads "ber. 1569".
At foot of title: Cum gratia & Priuilegio Regiae Maiestatis per Decennium.
Identified as STC 6694 on UMI microfilm reel 418.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Appears at reels 418, 736, and 1572 (all British Library copies).
